name: MedCenterDisplay
overview:
Healthcare Digital Communication Network

Developed and tested by physicians and medical staff, MedCenterDisplay is an advanced digital communication network specifically designed to meet the needs of healthcare facilities. Our multi-functional network immediately engages patients and their families while they are waiting to see their healthcare provider.

With completely customizable content, the MCD solution allows you to: Educate patients about a specific disease or condition Highlight the importance of fitness and a healthy lifestyle Encourage medication compliance and a healthy diet Introduce your patients to their physician and nursing staff Acknowledge your “Employee of the Month” Showcase community involvement Discuss other services that are related to your patients’ primary care needs Our visual communication media focuses on branding and patient education, but also includes cross-clinical marketing and advertising as a seamless whole.
